News&Politics | Yoursay | Must See | Iraq | Afghanistan | Entertainment | Chat | Staff Blog | More Blogs | Top Leakers Robber armed with shotgun robs a stop n food market Aug 27 2007 Richmond A man with a shotgun walks into the "Stop N FoodMarket", in Richmond. He demands the two clerks behind the counter give him all the money,and then he got away in a car. The clerks were not able to describe car. Loading the player ... Get Embed Code
